plot: Alfred's father wants him to make of a man of himself so sends him off on a hunting and fishing trip. He doesn't catch or shoot anything, but he does fall in love with a mountain girl. When her father and brothers laugh at this they are informed that he is Alfred &"Battling&" Butler, the championship fighter. From there on the masquerade must be maintained.   Written by  Ed Stephan
title: El boxeador

plot_en: Alfred's father wants him to make of a man of himself so sends him off on a hunting and fishing trip. He doesn't catch or shoot anything, but he does fall in love with a mountain girl. When her father and brothers laugh at this they are informed that he is Alfred &"Battling&" Butler, the championship fighter. From there on the masquerade must be maintained.   Written by  Ed Stephan
